p:
Following the method presented by Shaman et al.
10 , we calculated local anomalous T′ and absolute humidity AH′ values for each city, and 2-week period of the year from 2000 to 2015. For each 2-week period, T′ and AH′ are defined as the deviation in observed temperature T and actual absolute humidity AH from their 31-year mean values,

, respectively (Eqs. ( 5) and ( 6)).
